root.name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Worldwide Edition: Stairway to the Destined Duel
root.description: Stairway to the Destined Duel is a card game based on the second season of Yu-Gi-Oh! season. Set in Battle City, you take on the best duelists to create a reputation for yourself, and defeat an evil organization from gathering the 3 Egyptain God cards. The game features the same rules and loopholes as the card game, and loosely follows the plot of the second season by using the same characters and cards featured in the anime.You do not play as the main character, Yugi Muto, in this game, instead playing as an unnamed character seeing the world in a first person perspective.
